biotools.summary: BioPAN is a web-based tool to explore mammalian lipidome metabolic pathways on LIPID MAPS. BioPAN for Bioinformatics Methodology For Pathway Analysis is a tool that allows users to upload their own mammalian lipidomics dataset and perform a pathway analysis.

bioschemas.name: BioPAN
